attributes.action: take control of food pricing and distribution in schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, we have noticed a considerable mark up in food prices in our area. We feel it may also affect students nationally. It must be sorted out, for students now cannot afford some food and are going hungry. This government was all about education-but we can't learn on empty stomachs! Help us out!
